room_title: Escape room "Ben Franklin's Inferno" by Exit 4 Private Escape Rooms in Glassboro
room_description: It's 1777 and a saboteur has rigged the stove in Ben Franklin's workshop to run blazing hot until the entire building goes up in flames, delivering a major blow to the Revolution. It's up to you to figure out a way to save Franklin's workshop and all of its priceless contents!
